src:
Fler kunder hos Avanza men nettoinflödet av pengar minskar
Antalet kunder hos Avanza uppgick till 950.800 i oktober i år, jämfört med 939.100 i september och 820.500 i oktober 2018.
04 Nov 2019, 07:53 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
More customers at Avanza but the net inflow of money is decreasing
The number of Avanza customers was 950,800 in October this year, compared with 939,100 in September and 820,500 in October 2018.
04 Nov 2019, 07:53 by News Agency Direct
